childMarkdownRemark.html:
Some time ago someone asked what are my ambitions and what do I want to learn for myself.

Since this time I am more and more confronted with myself asking the same thing, what is it that I want to achieve and what I want to learn or like to do the most.

Honestly, these are some heavy questions.

My ambition is a Lead Developer, don't mind if it is in PHP or NodeJS or perhaps another language. Another one of my ambitions is to become a good father in about a year or two ;)

But what I would want to learn, this is an even tougher nut to crack, I have been thinking about this for a couple of days nowâ€¦

The answer that I have come up with aren't things I would like to learn, but more things I would like to do and fiddle with.

One of the major things is testing and testing frameworks as I have done way too little with them, another one is who, where and when to throw and catch error/ exceptions.

But further, I have complete love of the language(s) as a whole and don't love or hate a specific things.

So this is the first time I have been working my pizza skills, after getting the motivation to bake pizzas in my new BBQ (thanks to my employer).

I have been hitting the dough this saturday and on sunday we had the pizza as the dough needs some time to relax. After this I made the sauce on sunday just before putting it on the pizza.

Both my wife and I had a peperoni pizza with mozzerella, and for a first time I got a 7 out of 10 from my wife, so I can make them again.

In the mean time feast on our feast!

It's almost been 16 weeks already and the little guy keeps on growing and growing. Time for a little update after 12 weeks.

Everything so far is great! The little guy sleeps like a charm and is starting to talk a little. Sometimes a small accident here and there but that is part of the deal, but not too much to worry about.

A couple of weeks ago the little guy got his first shots (DKTP, Diftery, Kinkhoest, Tetanus and Polio) he took them like the little champ he is. Almost no tears and and when I wanted to console him it was good already. Of course he got a little hot but that was supposed to happen.

But the biggest change is that I am in charge of the household when mommy is going to work which starts at 17:30 at a good day otherwise it starts at 17:00. But just before going to bed the single issue of the night starts, he is missing mommy. But daddy is a good alternative but not the best...

After his feeding he becomes a little drowsy and then starts to cry as he wants to sleep but is tired as well en needs a firm hug (from mommy). After hugging a little he falls asleep like a leaf and wakes up about 6-8 hours later, yes he has always been a good sleeper from his third week on.

After his rest his daddy is well rested but mommy still isn't as she got home about 00:30 in the early morning and needs a little more sleep.

After this the entire household is happy again an ready for another day.

So for the last couple of weeks I have been remodeling the garden (at least the work, my wife had the idea). And god did it become beautiful, we now have a new terrace, a roof over the terrace and artificial grass.

Another improvement is the upgraded audio system in the office, as the old amp gave out of old age a new soundbar has been installed and god it is an improvement. It is the same model as with the TV but only a little smaller.

Update 20-5-2021:
Keeping in line with all the visual changes I am also planning and contemplating a new website design that will bring a little more life into the website as it now seem very bland, functional but bland.

nodes.title: Being a parent of a 4 weeks old

childMarkdownRemark.html:
So far it seems rather uneventful, he eats, sleeps, pees, and poes and at some very specific occasions he cries, especially if he is hungry.

Otherwise, it's a healthy baby boy who is very happy and didn't really throw a tantrum (yet).

At some points, he is a little difficult though, especially when he is deep asleep and needs feeding. At some point my wife and I just gave up because nothing we did woke him up, feeling as if he is sound asleep he probably didn't have any hunger.

Also at the consultation bureau, they didn't have any remarks on his growth and weight and said that we can make appointments every 2 weeks instead of every week.

The only downside, when he was 3 weeks old he had a special day and since then he doesn't sleep that long at night anymore. So the nights have become way more long and stressful.

However this is all part of the deal, and I don't want to have it any other way, as this is the first real time a guy has stolen my heart,

Hello World, here I am!

Born at the foot of spring I am healthy and happy! My name is Jamie Theodorus Jaswadipa van Rijbroek.

I was born via Caesarean section, and I am so proud of my mommy, she fought so hard.

Now in the care of my Mommy and Daddy we are heading home for our first night as a family, I am going to keept them awake for the entire night :D.

I hope to see you all in person very soon and I am eagerly awaiting you!

Love,

Jamie
